STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ROLES_LIST
STATEMENT.query: SELECT DISTINCT NAME as CODE, DESCR as DESCRIPTION FROM SBI_EXT_ROLES

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_USER_ROLES_LIST
STATEMENT.query: SELECT DISTINCT NAME as CODE, DESCR as DESCRIPTION FROM SBI_EXT_ROLES WHERE ROLE_TYPE_CD = ?

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ATTRIBUTES_LIST
STATEMENT.query: SELECT DISTINCT FUNCT_TYPE_CD as DESCRIPTION FROM SBI_FUNCTIONS

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_USER_ATTRIBUTES_LIST
STATEMENT.query: SELECT DISTINCT NAME as DESCRIPTION DESCR as CODE FROM SBI_EXT_ROLES WHERE ROLE_TYPE_CD = ?
